content: अनुविधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To lay down a rule, regulate. {@--2@} To obey, act up to, follow, conform to; See अनुविधायिन्; पदमनुविधेयं च महतां <ls>Bh. 2. 28</ls> the foot-steps of the great have to be trodden in. {@--3@} To resemble, imitate. {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} To be trained to follow rules; obey.
